# Clean Code - Robert C. Martin

## Summary

Essential reading for any developer. Principles here influenced our [[api-design]] and [[code-review-checklist]].

## Key Takeaways

1. Meaningful names
2. Small functions
3. Comments vs clean code
4. Error handling

## Application to Our Work

Applied these principles in [[project-alpha]]. Discussed with [[john-doe]] and [[jane-smith]].

See also: [[refactoring-guide]], [[testing-best-practices]]
